Quickstride looks up at Cyclonus with sarcasm.

" STAND BACK GUYS, I GOT TH=
IS!  OH YEAH PAL!?  TAKE THIS!"

He turns his rump on Cyclonus and blasts a=
 noxious fume into the sky in his direction.

" Hopefully this will knock h=
im out long enough ta figure out who put the bug on him."

Don't be envious=
 of what you don't have, be grateful for things you already posses.  Nothin=
g is worth more than family and friends.

On Nov 30, 2011, at 2:32 PM, Supe=
r Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> The group quickly began to s=
et off in an effort to locate where TUSCON
> and the others had been taken =
as well as to find out just who was
> behind all this madness or what he ha=
d planned.
> 
> The terrain was rough and unlevel, vehicles of any sort wou=
ld have had
> great difficulty making across any of it if there were any.
>=
 Fortunately most everone is traveling on leg or wing . . . or digging,
> s=
o they are able to keep pace with the passage. Foliage and underbrush
> mak=
ing the passing difficult but not impossible.
> 
> Following the signal tha=
t LEO PRIME had was taking them off any
> observable path, although curious=
ly it followed the trail that
> apparently TUSCON and his captors had taken=
, at least judging by what
> BANTOR and TERRORGATOR were detecting with the=
ir tracking skills.
> 
> Eventually they came out over a small mountain pas=
s, coming around
> where the trees opened up and for the first time a path =
could be seen
> again leading down into more trees.
> 
> LEO PRIME turned t=
o wave at HYDRAS, showing him the tracker, the
> beeping was getting more s=
teady, they were getting close when suddenly
> it was blasted out of LEO's =
hand as laser fire opened up on them from
> the now open air errupted all a=
round the group!
> 
> Trees were burned down, instantly incinerated by acid=
 and
> disintergration cannons, shrubbery vanished into nothingness! Up in
=
> the air the massive form of CYCLONUS hovered in his space interceptor
> m=
ode with sweeps and a few seekers flew around him like some sort of
> black=
 entorage.
> 
> "Surrender or die!" CYCLONUS ' deep voice said from the air=
!
> (TAG)
> 
> - Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-9A049436-DFAC-4B05-B5CB-83F16834CA84

<html><head></head><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Quickstride looks up at C=
yclonus with sarcasm.</div><div><br></div><div>" STAND BACK GUYS, I GOT THI=
S!  OH YEAH PAL!?  TAKE THIS!"</div><div><br></div><div>He turns =
his rump on Cyclonus and blasts a noxious fume into the sky in his directio=
n.</div><div><br></div><div>" Hopefully this will knock him out long enough=
 ta figure out who put the bug on him."<br><br>Don't be envious of what you=
 don't have, be grateful for things you already posses.  Nothing is wo=
rth more than family and friends.</div><div><br>On Nov 30, 2011, at 2:32 PM=
, Super Cyclonus <<a href=3D"mailto:supercyclonus@...">supercyclon=
us@...</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><div></div><blockquote type=3D"cit=
e"><div>














<span style=3D"display:none"> </span>



    <d=
iv id=3D"ygrp-text">
      
      
      <p>The group quickly began to set =
off in an effort to locate where TUSCON<br>
and the others had been taken a=
s well as to find out just who was<br>
behind all this madness or what he h=
ad planned.<br>
<br>
The terrain was rough and unlevel, vehicles of any sor=
t would have had<br>
great difficulty making across any of it if there were=
 any.<br>
Fortunately most everone is traveling on leg or wing . . . or dig=
ging,<br>
so they are able to keep pace with the passage. Foliage and under=
brush<br>
making the passing difficult but not impossible.<br>
<br>
Followi=
ng the signal that LEO PRIME had was taking them off any<br>
observable pat=
h, although curiously it followed the trail that<br>
apparently TUSCON and =
his captors had taken, at least judging by what<br>
BANTOR and TERRORGATOR =
were detecting with their tracking skills.<br>
<br>
Eventually they came ou=
t over a small mountain pass, coming around<br>
where the trees opened up a=
nd for the first time a path could be seen<br>
again leading down into more=
 trees.<br>
<br>
LEO PRIME turned to wave at HYDRAS, showing him the tracke=
r, the<br>
beeping was getting more steady, they were getting close when su=
ddenly<br>
it was blasted out of LEO's hand as laser fire opened up on them=
 from<br>
the now open air errupted all around the group!<br>
<br>
Trees we=
re burned down, instantly incinerated by acid and<br>
disintergration canno=
ns, shrubbery vanished into nothingness! Up in<br>
the air the massive form=
 of CYCLONUS hovered in his space interceptor<br>
mode with sweeps and a fe=
w seekers flew around him like some sort of<br>
black entorage.<br>
<br>
"S=
urrender or die!" CYCLONUS ' deep voice said from the air!<br>
(TAG)<br>
<b=
r>
- Preston<br>
</p>
